meanings.definition: Not changing in form or character; remaining the same in all cases and at all times.
meanings.sent1: The sky had a uniform blue color throughout the day.
meanings.sent2: The students wore a uniform expression during the test.
meanings.sent3: The robot's uniform movements made it seem almost human.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a uniform tone that never wavered.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's uniform appearance reflected his discipline.

meanings.definition: A distinctive set of clothing worn by members of the same organization or group.
meanings.sent1: The police officer put on his uniform before starting his shift.
meanings.sent2: The team wore their uniform proudly during the championship game.
meanings.sent3: The clown's colorful uniform made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The uniform of the waitstaff added a touch of professionalism to the restaurant.
meanings.sent5: The marching band's uniform was a striking combination of red and gold.
